scripts.init: python -m venv mecchi_venv && call mecchi_venv/Scripts/activate.bat && pip install -r install/requirements.txt && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.init:linux: python -m venv mecchi_venv && . mecchi_venv/bin/activate && pip install -r install/requirements.txt && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.serve:debug: call mecchi_venv/Scripts/activate.bat && npx vite build && npx tsc && cross-env NODE_PATHS='../assets/components/nodes/' NODE_FILE_EXTENSION='.js' python src/mecchi.py
scripts.update: call mecchi_venv/Scripts/activate.bat && pip install -r install/requirements.txt && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.update:linux: . mecchi_venv/bin/activate && pip install -r install/requirements.txt && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.mecchi: npm run init && npm run serve
scripts.mecchi:linux: npm run init:linux && npm run build && npm run serve:web:server
scripts.torch-cuda: call mecchi_venv/Scripts/activate.bat && pip uninstall -y torch && pip install torch --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu118 --force-reinstall --no-deps
scripts.torch-cuda:linux: . mecchi_venv/bin/activate && pip uninstall -y torch && pip install torch --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu118 --force-reinstall --no-deps
